<<<api>>>: InputStream.read
<<<code>>>: byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];
int bytesRead = is.read(buffer);
if (bytesRead == -1) {
// handle error
} else {
byte[] byteArray = new byte[bytesRead];
System.arraycopy(buffer, 0, byteArray, 0, bytesRead);
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the `InputStream.read()` method to read an entire InputStream into a byte array. The method takes a byte array as an argument and reads up to `byteArray.length` bytes from the InputStream into the array. If the end of the InputStream is reached before all the bytes are read, the method returns -1.
